channel.title: Spawning items on ground
channel.description: Hey guys i have quick question: 1) How can i make that seeds would spawn on ground every 30 seconds? 2) Where do i have to place it? :palm: Btw.: my other topic wasn't answered: 3) i set lumby teleport to my wanted cords. but it still teleports me into edge.

Woaw buddy ur god of newbies :3

item.title: Spawning items on ground
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You’re posting a lot of topics, you could really save (literally) everyone some time by putting them all into the same topic.

  1. Add a global item spawning system. something like this should suffice.

  2. read ^

  3. Just because you set the static variable “LUMBY_X” to the coords you wanted doesn’t mean that the button itself is using that variable. Check the clicking buttons class for the actionButtonId of the button you clicked (it’s like 4141 I think). You can figure out the ID by adding:

if(c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Your playername")) {
     c.sendMessage("Button ID: " + actionButtonId);
}

above:

Read full topic
